name: motcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2), wf1o(c0, c2, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(wf1o(c0, c2, c2), wf(c0, c2, c2))

stmt.origin: motf1o(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
stmt.pretty: motf1o(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c2, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, cismt, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wf1o(c0, c2, c2), wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, cismt, c3)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
